description:
A learner at heycoach has been given a problem  to solve, he has been asked to find count of the occurrences of a special integer(X) in an sorted array. The learner accepted the challenge and comes up with a solution but it was not optimal. Help him to build the solution that requires no extra space and runs in log N time where N is the size of the array.
1 ≤ N ≤ 10^5
1 ≤ v[i], X ≤ 10^18
title: Occurences of an Integer in an sorted array
